Text: Ochu e̩kebie-wñ, o̩jo̩ ogu nyokeʼka ochu le̩, o̩la Jihofa lʼugbo Hagai akache̩ le̩ wa kakini,
E̩ nako̩la ñwu Zerubabe̩l o̩ma Shealtie̩l, igo̩bina Juda, kpai Jo̩shua o̩ma Jehozadak, agboji amatama, kpai abubo̩ amone̩ le̩ kakini,
E̩ne̩ bo̩ ef ume̩ kʼi li unyi-i iko ojima-wñ o̩gbo̩gba le̩? Ab i de̩ eju-me̩ fa-i? I dabe̩ne̩ kʼibe̩te̩ ofofo eju-me̩ n?

I chaka dʼabe̩le̩, fʼeju gbiti, uwe̩ Zerubabe̩l, Jihofa ka-i; fʼeju gbiti, uwe̩ Jo̩shua o̩ma Jehozadak, agboji amatama; me̩ fʼeju gbiti, ame̩ amone̩ ane̩-i du, Jihofa ka-i, ku me̩ chuko̩lo̩: todu omi dʼugbo me̩, Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka-i,
owñ chʼo̩la kʼu kpalo kpʼame̩ e̩gba kʼame̩ kwʼIjipti wa le̩, abe̩le̩ Afu-mi dʼef ume̩; me̩ ki railo n.
Todu abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka de̩ kakini, Iko-wñ bo̩ ree, kʼu naño̩ fʼefojale kpai ane̩-ile̩ kpai ohimini kpai ane̩ e̩gbe̩ miejo onuʼka ta;
oñ nami abo uche̩ichi du ejo tak e̩wñ ube̩do̩ e-abo uche̩ichi du awa; tak omi akʼojima jʼef unyi-i e̩ko̩, Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka-i.
Ajifa chʼe-mi, o̩jamalia chʼe-mi, Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka-i.
Ojima unyi-i e-otitala anana tʼe-o̩gbo̩gba le, Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka-i; uña kide̩ oñ nadʼure̩do̩ te̩, Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka-i.
O̩jo̩ ogu nyoke me̩le̩ ochu e̩ke̩la, o̩do̩ ekeji ki Darius jʼonu, o̩la Jihofa lʼugbo Hagai akache̩ le̩ wa, kakini,
Abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka de̩ kakini, Tʼamatama ene ugbo e̩wñ o̩lo̩da ta, kakini,

Iche̩wñ kʼone̩ nʼe̩la kiafo̩ nyʼe̩re̩ otogbo-wñ kʼe̩re̩ otogbo-wñ kwokadʼakala, abe̩k o̩je̩, abe̩k omi achiwebe̩te̩ma, abe̩k ekpo, abe̩k uje̩wñ du, e̩wñ kʼotogbo-wñ kado le̩ afo̩? Tak amatama dohi kakini, O̩da.
Taku Hagai kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩kʼo̩la-wñ daji lugbo oku e̩wñ kwokado e-du ef e̩wñ-i, e̩wñ le̩ adaji? Tak amatama dohi kakini, I adaji.
Taku Hagai dohi kakini, Abe̩le̩ amone̩-i de̩, oñ abe̩le̩ abo ichi-i de̩ eju-mi-i, Jihofa ka-i; abe̩le̩ uko̩lo̩ du kʼo̩wo̩-ma che la de̩ ge̩; oñ e̩wñ du ku ma ko wa o̩mo̩ chʼe̩daji.
O̩ko̩ nagba bʼume̩-i kakini, Me̩ fulo akwʼejubi wʼeñini-i, o̩gba taku ma kʼokuta nʼe̩do̩ okuta ef unyi Jihofa-i.
Agbagba le̩ du e̩gba kʼone̩ lewa ugbo ku ma kʼoj adu ogu jo̩, i mud e̩gwa; e̩gba kʼone̩ lewa añmo̩ omi achiwebe̩te̩ma kʼi che otube̩ ooje, i mud ogu kate.
U ne̩ ikpetubi kpai ekpebu kpai okuto̩mo̩jo̩cha kpa me̩ ugbo uko̩lo̩ du kʼo̩wo̩-me̩ che, me̩ muda dabi wa ba mi n, Jihofa ka-i.
Me̩ fʼibe akwʼejubi wʼeñini kide̩ owñ chʼakwo o̩jo̩ ogu nyoke me̩le̩ ochu e̩ke̩la le̩ lo, owñ chʼakwʼo̩jo̩ ku ma dʼe̩re̩ unyi Jihofa nyane̩, me̩ fʼibe e-le̩ lo.
Ulu e̩wñ jʼef aka ta? Ochochi, ikeli achiwebe̩te̩ma kpai oli o̩gbaikolo kpai po̩me̩grane̩t kpai oli o̩lif la ro ta n; akwʼeñini ki de̩ nadʼe̩nyo̩ ñwu me̩.
Tak o̩la Jihofa ño̩ wʼugbo Hagai onu keji o̩jo̩ ogu nyoke me̩le̩ ochu le̩, kakini,
E̩ ka ñwu Zerubabe̩l, igo̩bina Juda kakini, Nami efojale kpai ile̩ ejo;

u la agu ede ojane̩ ojane̩ amonu lo̩; u ñʼakpʼukpahiu ojane̩ ojane̩ abo uche̩ichi bie̩; u la akʼo̩ko̩ ogu kpai abo ku ma jʼef uwñ dafo; tak amanya kpʼabo ku ma tanʼo awane̩, o̩kwo̩chageli o̩maye-wñ adʼe̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ wane̩.

Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du kakini, O̩jo̩ kʼu naka-i, omi amʼuwe̩ Zerubabe̩l adu-mi, kʼe̩ chʼo̩ma Shealtie̩l le̩ du kʼu dʼe̩ che dabe̩ne̩ kʼelika uhiuko̩, Jihofa ka-i: todu uwe̩ omi chi, Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka-i.
